title-part.text: TREATMENT, e.g. PRESERVATION, OF FLOUR OR DOUGH, e.g. BY ADDITION OF MATERIALS
Treatment of flour or dough by adding materials thereto

note.note-paragraph: In groups A21D2/02 to A21D2/40, in the absence of an indication to the contrary, a substance is classified in the last appropriate place

CPC-specific-text.text: from leguminous or other vegetable seeds; from press-cake or oil bearing seeds

title-part.text: Apparatus for the chemical treatment of flour or dough
Preserving flour or dough before baking by storage in an inert atmosphere
Other treatment of flour or dough before baking, e.g. cooling, irradiating, heating
Methods for preparing dough or for baking

reference.text: machines or equipment for making or processing dough A21C

title-part.text: Treating dough with micro-organisms or enzymes

CPC-specific-text.text: with a leaven or a composition containing acidifying bacteria

title-part.text: Prevention of sticking, e.g. to baking plates
Batters, dough or mixtures before baking

CPC-specific-text.text: Dough mixes; Baking or bread improvers; Premixes
Solid, dry or compact materials; Granules; Powders
Partially or completely coated bakery products

reference.text: multi-layered bakery products with coating A21D13/0051, A21D13/0061

CPC-specific-text.text: comprising a barrier coating against migration

reference.text: multi-layered bakery products with filling A21D13/0054, A21D13/0064

CPC-specific-text.text: Filled before baking of the dough
Filled or to be filled after baking of the dough, e.g. sandwiches
Edible containers, e.g. cups or cones to be filled
comprising a barrier against migration between filling and dough or bakery product
Co-extruded product, i.e. obtained by co-extruding the dough and the filling
made of at least 2 different doughs, e.g. differing in composition, colour or structure
multi-layered pastry, e.g. puff pastry, danish pastry, laminated dough
Croutons from bread or backery products
Bakery products with first function other than for eating, e.g. toys, cutlery
Fat fried bakery products, e.g. doughnuts, spring rolls

title-part.text: Bakery products from whole meal or containing rough-ground grain or bran
Bread from materials other than rye or wheat flour
Bread with modified starch or protein content,

CPC-specific-text.text: with modified fat content or fat-free

reference.text: refreshing A21D17/00, packaging or wrapping bakery products B65B, B65D

CPC-specific-text.text: e.g. with microbiocidal agents, with protective films
e.g. with microbiocidal agents, with protective films
Recycling, e.g. for use in baking or for animal consumption
